name: Snail's race
description:
Snail's race is a game where you play a snail... well in a race ! It was done in 3 hours in the Unity Engine with the only instruction that it should be 20 seconds long.

Press repeatedly the space bar to move your snail and win the race.

Have fun !

Portfolio : Snail's race | Jeanne Boudouresque (jpro44.wixsite.com)
